column5: Was thinking of taking the kids out on the ice tomorrow to see if we can catch a couple.  Just wondering if the ice is still safe to take the atv out.  Was going to try out from Lefroy.  Any insight would be great.  Bill
You beter have a gas auger or eat lot of spinach tonight. Out there today, anywhere from 24-30+ inches. Couldn't believe when the auger almost bottomed out drilling the first hole.
not a good time to try out my new manual auger (CTC special)
Better get eating some spinnach.  Manual auger for us buddies.  Guess it's plenty safe still for a couple atv's
It was fairly slushy in spots, but other places were fine.  What fish you targeting?  Joey
Taking the misses out for a shot at Perch and maybe Mr. Pike if he shows up  Would rather she didn't have to work so hard with the manual auger
